segments.text: I feel so neutral watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing by the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quiet, trying not to draw any attention to themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for the cookie jar, standing on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are taking cookies without asking, but they're being careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice anything before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just unfolding naturally, without any major interruptions.
segments.speaker: PAR
